member.name: M:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new that runs one window per screen.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Exit
member.summary: Occurs before the screensaver windows close.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.OneSecondTick
member.summary: Occurs once each second on a thread separate from the window thread.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.framerate
member.summary: Gets or sets the target framerate.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Update
member.summary: Occurs when the screensaver should process its logic and render.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.achievedFramerate
member.summary: Actual framerate achieved. This value is updated once each second.

member.name: M:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.run
member.summary: Start the screensaver in windowed mode if the file extension is not scr, unless a mode is specified in the command line. Otherwise, if the file extension is scr, start the screensaver in config mode.

member.name: M:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.run(Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverMode)
member.summary: Start the screensaver in the specified mode unless one is specified in the command line.
member.param: The mode in which to run the screensaver. This value cannot be .

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.mode
member.summary: Gets the current running mode of the screensaver.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Initialize
member.summary: Occurs after the windows are created, before the screensaver runs.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.closeOnMouseMove
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the screensaver should close when the user moves the mouse.
member.remarks: This value is true by default in all modes except .

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.closeOnClick
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the screensaver should close when the user clicks the mouse.
member.remarks: This value is true by default in all modes except .

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.closeOnKeyboardInput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the screensaver should close when the user presses a key.
member.remarks: This value is true by default in all modes except .

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.windows
member.summary: Gets a collection of all of the running screensaver windows.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.window0
member.summary: Gets the primary screensaver window.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.graphics0
member.summary: Gets the GDI graphics object for the primary window.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.settingsText
member.summary: Gets or sets text to be displayed in the default settings message box.

member.name: M:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.showSettingsDialog
member.summary: Shows the settings dialog, or, by default, shows a message box indicating the assembly name, version and copyright information.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.doubleBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the Graphics object should be double buffered. Set to false if the Graphics object will not be used.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.MouseMove
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is moved over this window.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.MouseClick
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is clicked inside this window.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.MouseDoubleClick
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is double clicked inside this window.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.MouseWheel
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse wheel is moved inside this window.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.MouseUp
member.summary: Occurs when a mouse button goes up inside this window.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.MouseDown
member.summary: Occurs when a mouse button goes down inside this window.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.KeyDown
member.summary: Occurs when a key goes down.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.KeyUp
member.summary: Occurs when a key is released.

member.name: E:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.KeyPress
member.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.tag
member.summary: Gets or sets a tag value.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.screensaver
member.summary: Gets the for which this window was created.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.form
member.summary: Gets the form encapsulating this window. This property is null if the screensaver is running in preview mode.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.handle
member.summary: Gets the native handle of the window.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.size
member.summary: Gets the size of the window.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.graphics
member.summary: Gets the GDI graphics object for this window.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.screen
member.summary: Gets the screen on which this window resides

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window.deviceIndex
member.summary: Gets the display device index to use with this window.

member.name: T:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.Window
member.summary: Represents a screensaver window.

member.name: P:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore.WindowCollection.item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the window at the given index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the screensaver window.
member.returns: The window at hte given index.

member.summary: Gets the number of screensaver windows available.

member.summary: Represents a collection of screensaver windows.

member.name: T:Screensaver.SpriteEngine.ScreensaverCore
member.summary: Provides initialization, timing and windowing facilities for screensavers.

member.summary: Single window covering all monitors.

member.summary: Multiple windows, one for each monitor.
